section.title: Object pronouns
section.sectiontitle2: Use subject pronouns before verbs and object pronouns after verbs.
section.text3: Subject pronoun: <Font color='#A6416E'>I</Font> love my sister.
section.text3a: Object pronoun: My sister loves <Font color='#A6416E'>me</Font>.
section.text4: Subject pronoun: <Font color='#A6416E'>She</Font> wants a pizza.
section.text4a: Object pronoun: The pizza is for <Font color='#A6416E'>her</Font>.
